scripts.build:easel: gleam format && gleam build && npx rollup -f iife -i ./build/dev/javascript/eyg/easel.js -o build/bundle/easel.js
scripts.start:easel: npm run build:easel && rm -rf sirv && mkdir sirv && cp -r ../website/public/layout.css ../website/public/neo.css  ../website/public/editor/index.html build/bundle/easel.js sirv && npx sirv sirv --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8080
scripts.build:drafting: gleam format && gleam build && npx rollup -f iife -i ./build/dev/javascript/eyg/drafting.js -o build/bundle/drafting.js
scripts.start:drafting: npm run build:drafting && rm -rf sirv && mkdir sirv && cp -r ../website/public/layout.css ../website/public/neo.css  src/drafting/index.html build/bundle/drafting.js sirv && npx sirv sirv --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8080
scripts.build:spotless: gleam format && gleam build && npx rollup -f iife -i ./build/dev/javascript/eyg/spotless.js -o build/bundle/spotless.js
scripts.start:spotless: npm run build:spotless && rm -rf sirv && mkdir sirv && cp -r saved/saved.json saved/prompt.json ../website/public/layout.css ../website/public/neo.css src/spotless/vendor src/spotless/index.html build/bundle/spotless.js sirv && npx sirv sirv --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8080
scripts.build:magpie: npm run build:magpie:worker && npm run build:magpie:app
scripts.start:magpie: gleam build && npm run build:magpie && rm -rf sirv && mkdir sirv && cp build/bundle/app.js build/bundle/worker.js src/magpie/index.html sirv && npx sirv sirv --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5000
scripts.build:datalog: gleam format && gleam build && npx rollup -f iife -i ./build/dev/javascript/eyg/datalog.js -o build/bundle/datalog.js
scripts.start:datalog: npm run build:datalog && rm -rf sirv && mkdir sirv && cp -r ../website/public/layout.css ../website/public/neo.css  src/datalog/index.html build/bundle/datalog.js src/datalog/examples sirv && npx sirv sirv --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8080
scripts.build:examine: gleam format && gleam build && npx rollup -f iife -i ./build/dev/javascript/eyg/examine.js -o build/bundle/examine.js
scripts.start:examine: npm run build:examine && rm -rf sirv && mkdir sirv && cp -r ../website/public/layout.css ../website/public/neo.css  src/examine/index.html build/bundle/examine.js sirv && npx sirv sirv --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8080
